snippet: The University of Oslo says it has rejected an admissions application from Anders Behring Breivik, who was convicted of killing 77 people two years ago.
abstract: University of Oslo says it has rejected an admissions application from Anders Behring Breivik, man serving 21-year prison sentence for killing 77 people in bomb and gun massacres; prison officials say Breivik could study in his cell if admitted by a university.
lead_paragraph: The University of Oslo says it has rejected an admissions application from Anders Behring Breivik, who was convicted of killing 77 people two years ago.
